Plot: An intergalactic dog pilot from Sirius (the dog star), visits Earth to verify the rumors that dogs have failed to take over the planet.
Title: Good Boy!
Writer: Zeke Richardson (story), Zeke Richardson (screen story), John Hoffman (screen story), John Hoffman (screenplay)
Actors: Molly Shannon, Liam Aiken, Kevin Nealon, Brittany Moldowan
tomatoConsensus: Good Boy! should appeal to kids. Adults, however, might consider it a dog.
